name: Dengeki Construction: Ochige!-Yarouze
overview: Dengeki Construction - Ochige - Yarouze! is a classic 2D puzzle game in which the player controls a young girl that will have to defeat different enemies in different stages to complete the game. But this is the classic puzzle mode and the game got some themes for this kind of game. The puzzle mode (already created by the game) features 3 modes: 1 player vs computer, 1 player vs another human player and a 1 player mode. But the game features also a complete editor that let's the player design his own levels and puzzle pieces. The game is also multitap and mouse compatible.
